text: Alexander Warren Hughes (born September 18, 2000) is an American singer, songwriter and YouTuber. His song "Ordinary" gave him huge success and fame when it topped the charts. His music style has influences from worship music, Christian music and folk music. == Early music == Warren released his first song "One More I Love You" in June, it was then followed by another song called "Screaming Underwater" released September 10. Both songs got him viral on social media platforms. In September 27, 2024, he also released his debut studio album "You'll Be Alright, Kid (Chapter 1)" which was followed by the singles "Burning Down" and "Troubled Waters." == Debut studio album == Main article: You'll Be Alright, Kid (Chapter 1) Alex Warren released his debut studio album "You'll Be Alright, Kid (Chapter 1)," in 2024. The album had some of his huge hits and viral songs in it. == Popularity uprising == In 2024, Warren released the song "Burning Down" which got on the Billboard's Hot 100, giving him his first big hit. After that, Warren released the song "Ordinary" that gave him huge success and fame once it topped the charts. == References == Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century American singer-songwriters Category:American YouTubers Category:Singer-songwriters from California
title: Alex Warren
